text:
Me: “Vaccine coming soon!”
Son: “I get to touch people again!” 😂

Me: “Reaching out. Touching me. Touching yoooouuuu!!”
Both of us: “SWEET CAROLINE!”
Son: “Dah dah dah!”
Me: “Good times never seemed so good!”
Son: “So good! So good! So good!”

(we are excited) #COVID19 #vaccine https://t.co/ULzTh7twQz
